1.content:
"Rain. Again?! Really?"
Thats what you said as you stepped out of your parents house. The mailbox flag was lifted up, signifying mail had been delivered here. Your mom and sisters had already gone to work and school(respectively), so you were left to go. You went over and picked it out.
"Bill...bill...my bill....dads playboy...everything seems in order." You say as you pick up your bookbag that you set down. You started your walk to the bus stop - a corner about a block and a half down the road.
You didn't have to take the bus, you had your own car, but at gas at 4.15 dollars a gallon at the moment, it was just easier to take advantage of the free ride. Surely he was the oldest on his bus, but only by two years. You start to shuffle through the mail, until a particular letter appears to you. You open it.


Dear Skye fakelastname,

We have recieved you letter and would like to inform you that we would be happy to let you attend Brown. We would honor to have you at are campus. Welcome to the Ivy League. Of course, even with your outstanding record up to this point, we require you finish your high school education this year.

Signed,
The Brown People
(and Carl, our Janitor)

"Hoe lee shit." You say as the letter drops from your hands. You figured they would turn you down, you figured even Clown College would turn you down! This was awesome, now your name would live on, Skye, the man who didn't completely fail at life! Thoughts raced about your head as you arrived at the bus stop, and even when the bus arrived. Hell, you were shaking with joy. Your off to college! Well, if you pass. And with only two weeks(plus a day) of school left, it was going to be easy. Of course, you would need to avoid anything that could screw it up, but whats the worst that could happen. You couldn't wait to tell Anna, your girlfriend. You had both tried to go out for Brown, and you were sure she would make it. You were only a smidge better, a few grade points better. Her weakest point being Math, she normally got Bs and Cs on it, but failed a few tests.

Once arriving at the school, you skipped off the bus and walked your happy walk up to the doors. You breath a big breath of air, whip open the doors, and.....

BLACK THE FUCK OUT.

You wake up an hour later, 20 minutes before first period ends. You see it on the moon.
The moon....?
The moon isn't in the school building, whats going on?
The thing is, what your looking at is not the moon, its the hallway clock. Its big enough that you can hear its ticking. You can also hear the feet of a teenager who is walking towards you, hall pass in hand. Wait, you know her! Thats your best friends girfriend, Kaitlyn! She and you are on a friends - not friends basis.You antagonize her and everything, she threatens to break your face. You are her boyfriends best friend, so she might help you. It could go either way.
Theres also Anna, or even Jun, your best friend, himself! They are in two different classes, English and History respectfully. You could also go for you younger siblings, but they are all in father away classes, and its not certain if you could make it to them or not. While the closest class belongs to Amelia, she kind of hates you. She goes to Home Ec during second period, so you might just want to journey there. Its on the other side of the building, and is a long, hard distance, but you might catch her there.
Britney, while being a dumbass, has Chemistry next period. Its closer, but shes a dumbass! And Jessica, well she, uh, never told you her schedule, or you never listened....how old is she anyway?
What do you do?!
1.title: Rain Rain, go away, come again anot-holy shit I'm-

101.content:
Another day, another dollar. Thats what you, Skye thought as your ride bumped and bounced. Also, your ride was your sister Amelia's backpack. Thing is, you were only two and three-fourths tall. Now, this wasn't weird or new, to you anyway. You suffered from a rare birth deffect, RFSS, or Really Fucking Small Syndrome. It was genetic, and according to your doctor, had remained dormat in your mothers family for hundreds, maybe thousands of years. Some mixed drugs and smokes brought it out though. Your mother even quit them before Jessica was made.

         Thats why your the only 'small' person in your family, but you did have one small friend, Chijinda You, whose mom also did some hard drugs and smoked, only difference from your mom is that she didn't quit, and died of overdosing. Chijinda's dad remarried, and Chijinda rather enjoys having two younger brothers and an older sister-in-law. Even though they were all average sized. You had three younger sisters(though one doesn't seem to have your dads Y chromosome), and one younger brother, but he had been kidnapped by ninjas...

         Thats why you were in your sisters knapsack at the moment, they all shifts when ut came to looking after you...Amelia took you to school, Jessica kept an eye on you throughout the school day, and Britney drove you home in her car, though she is kinda an airhead, and usually takes you along with her to the mall. Then again, you'd rather be with the airhead then with the sister going through her homicidal phase. Don't be foolish though, years of near death experiences had made you tough, smart, and able to take being stepped on or sat on. However, it had still hurt, and your bones never stayed whole for long, you weren't immortal, but you were resilient.

         Still, you had been a burden to your family. Turns out, checking everything before you did anything was tiring, even eating was a pain in the ass for them. You would be locked in your (custom made)doll house and placed in the attic during family cleaing day, and kept out of the way when guests came out. Also, you were never permitted near any sibling under the age of nine, god knows what would happen.

         Then again, it wasn't all bad. Your dad was a developer at Apple, and made you a mini Macintosh Computer, it even had 14 GB worth of memory. Jun(your normal sized friend) said that wasn't alot, but you need to take in the size of it. Your dad also payed a famous carpenter and builder to help him build you a doll house, that could plug in to have full electricity distributed throughout it. Hou wished you could never leave it sometimes. Plus, you had Jun, Chijinda, and Isaac to hang out with.

         You snap out of your memories when a hand comes into the rucksack and grabs you. It lays you not-so-gently infront of the door to your homeroom. Amelia waves her hand back nonchalauntly as she walked away. Ahhh, you caring siblings.

I'll need to find a similar pebble. That reminded her that she hadn't actually seen the pebble yet. She would have to take it out later to examine it. Hannah had this little smile forming at the corner of her mouth. Feeling her precious little pebble rubbing the bottom part of the ball of her foot was nothing short of amazing. A slight twitch of her big two, and it slid to the right. The smallest twitch from her pinky and fourth toe, and it slid to the left. It was almsot as if that tiny pebble had a will of its own - trying to oppose her petite toes at times. As Hannah hummed a little song above - she just couldn't ignore the feeling that it almost felt as if that tiny pebble, that's been making love to her sweaty foot for the last hour or so, almost didn't want to be under her..

She just had to check it out.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------

Another twitch, another hell. No, hell didn't even begin to describe what you've been going through. You could feel every muscle at work here, and sometimes, when her toes started moving around - it sounded like the cracking of an old ship at sea. Sweat covered each inch of this part, and when you adjusted to the low lightning, you could actually see drops accumulating between her gigantic, stinky toes, forced down her ball as her toes wiggled in anticipation all around you.
At one point, you would be rubbed head first into the soft, sweaty flesh. Forcing your mouth open, your clothes soaked wet and your eyes burning with a salty sensation. You wanted to scream, fight, do something - but all you could do was cry, as the foot made contact with your upper body, forcing you into a deep, passionate kiss.
At first you thought all of this movement around you was random, at best. But then, you started to notice something - after a few good seconds of agonizing rubbing, her big toe would start to pount against the shoe insole - forcing you towards it, rubbing off any dirt or sweat that has accumulated along the way. After reaching a certain point, they'd stop their constant wiggling, and make sure to give the ball's flesh a chance to rub itself against you. Then, the same thing happened again - only this time, to the other direction, the smallest toes leading the way..
You couldn't speak, almost couldn't move - and almost couldn't think. But the only thing that passed through your weak little mind during this insane torture was, that, this little girl is no dummy. No, when it comes to pleasuring herself, she knows exectly what she's doing. And you just earned yourself a front row seat to the entire show.

You don't know how long it's been. Maybe a few seconds, minutes or even an hour. You've been rolled around for so long, you've gotten to know every part of this little girl's smelly foot. You don't even remember what it's like being a person, anymore - all you remember is that you're just a tiny rock. Rolled in sweat, gunk and dirt. Rubbing itself against the soft, moving flesh of this goddess above you. Absorbing her godly sweat and rubbing against her colossal ball, with the tiniest of tickles.
Yep, those little laughes and moans of pleasure, hardly reaching into the inner surface of the sneaker from up above - made sure you remember your pathetic part.
And made sure you'd keep doing it, well.

When, suddenly..

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------

Hannah couldn't resist it anymore. After playing with the pebble for a few good minutes now, allowing it to massage the sore ball of her foot and gather every single drop of sweat from it, she just had to get it out and find out what it actually is.
"It's material is so absorbent", So whispered to herself, "I've never seen or felt a stone like this before..", she giggled.
She knew how lucky she was, finding her little pebble friend.

Lifting the heel of her foot out of the shoe, Hannah stuck one of her fingers into the sneaker through the back. Fearing that someone might notice her bizzare behavior, she took a few good, long moments, scratching her dry heel. Only when she was sure nobody was watching her, she continued inserting her finger further, scraping against the sole of the shoe, and the beggining of the ball of her foot.

She was about to get her prize out.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------

"What the hell was that?", was all you could think of.
At first, you thought you heard some sort of a distant sound, like a screeching of sorts, but thought this girl might have just shuffled her feet about. However, when the screeching became closer, and getting more violent - you understood something was very, very wrong. Without warning, the ceiling of foot flesh above you, collided with your tiny body, forcing you under it. Every single muscle fiber was contracting all together, and altough you had no idea what was going on, you knew that something was disturbing them.
"Am I going to die?", was the last thought that went through your head, as the tomb of flesh around you sealed shut.
Then, suddenly, you could feel something. Near your feet. The flesh is.. lifting? up? what is going on?
And then, something else. Something was coming in, nearing your direction. Like a giant snake, it lifted itself off the ground in the smallest of steps. Its front, glistening end facing your upper torso.
It fought against the sticky, smelly flesh that was trying to hold it back - but it's nimble movements were no match for the smelly surroundings around it. Soon, it reached your leg, forcing itself over it. You felt its sheer power, overwhelming and merciful at the same time, slowly glide towards your head. After covering some more ground, it finally reached your penis - rubbing against it slowly, as if it was trying to understand your exact form and shape. "No, please..", you cried out, and as if it heard your cries, just before the climax, it lifted up and continued on its journey.
A few more gentle squeezes, and it was already at your head. Rubbing its pad aginst your hair, it locked itself around you, wrapping you in warmth and squashing you into the insole below, forcing some more room. Then, as a final courtesy, forcing its glistening end under your head, like a gigantic pillow.
You lay there, looking at the vast cieling of flesh above you. You lay there, humbled to be in the presence of such a creature, and almost feel yourself drifting into sleep in the hands of your saviour. You finally think that this torture, this hellish nightmare is over - since the foot flesh is seem to be held in its place for good.

But you were wrong.

Swiftly and without warning, Your saviour pushed you, head first, into the soft ceiling of flesh. You thought the toes has powers beyond your understanding - but this was something else. Your entire body jolted into action, you yelled at the top of your lungs as you were trying to get the tiniest bit of air into your chest..
Whatever this thing was, it was trying to suffocate you into death.
Then, at the highest of speed, it retreated. Taking you along with it for the ride. Scraping your head, torso, legs and even erect penis into the vast line, that was this little girl's foot flesh. What the hell was she doing?!
Being rolled over all around the place by this enormous snake, you gaged for air. The feeling of vertigo forcing you to hold your stomach down as hard as you could. You couldn't breathe, couldn't move, couldn't comprehend what was happening to you, or why did your seviour turn up on you like that.
All you could do, is wait for this torturous ride to be over - you, or the sweaty ridges of her smelly foot. Whichever comes first.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------

Making sure to squeeze the pebble between her foot flesh and her finger, so he couldn't escape - she started rolling him up her foot, all the way to her heel.
"Man, my feet sweat like crazy.. No wonder this pebble feels so squishy, I wouldn't like to be in it's position", she giggled once again.

Hannah's inquisitive eyebrows arched up as she plucked your form out from her humid flat, freeing you at last from the crushing sole and torturous toes. You are damp, no, coated entirely in the little girl's foot sweat as she crinkles her nose and examines you, your form so small that it makes it difficult to discern the minute details of human features. Unfortunately for you, you had attracted so much dirt, dust, and dead skin from Hannah's heel (which had readily adhered to the sticky sweat covering your tiny body) that you resembled, at least to the eye of a regular sized person, a small, grey-brown pebble. And to Hannah and her powerful toes, that's precisely what you were.

The visible ridges of her fingertips grip you easily, pinning you nicely between them as the preteen goddess comes to this unlucky conclusion. Your hair, matted and tangled from the long rubbing against the sweaty ridges of her sole, rife with bits of dirt and coated with oil from the girl's skin, hardly was any help as your captor's fingers prevent any movement aside from curling up in a defensive ball.

"It must be a porous kind of stone.. Like pumice?" The intelligent grade schooler mused aloud. "That't the only explanation as to why it's so absorbent... and not too hard, either." Hannah ponders.

The light brown brow of the once little girl furrows in concentration. She recalls the last week in class, learning about something called the scientific method. Her face lights up. "Ah, that's it! I'll run an experiment!" She grins, plucking up a small stone from the ground. "This can be the ... control!" she says, slipping the pebble into her opposite shoe to share your hellish fate. "And I'll take notes on how each pebble reacts to sweat and pressure... and if they don't match each other, I'll know that my favorite pebble isn't one of those!" Hannah beams, quite proud of herself. You try to make any sign of your sentience, reach out to this curious little girl that has been subjecting you to a foot-flavored hell, but it is too late.

Hannah, excited to learn more about you and try out her new knowledge, lowers her huge digits towards the dingy flat, sliding you through the small pocket of air between her raised heel and the slick insole below. The towering legs in jeans that reach to heaven are replaced by the all-too-familiar sight of the light-brown skin above, glistening with barely perceptible pores dripping with sweat, the soft, bunching wrinkles giving way to a taut arch as she stretches her foot up, the cavern getting narrower and narrower, as she grinds her new favorite pebble along the slick folds of skin in the hot flat, the insole and the ball of her foot sandwiching together as she slips you back where she has decided you belong. you poop into the small arch formed by her toes, and the creak like monstrous constructions, squeezing around you like they've missed playing with you. The familiar stench of little girl feet permeates your pores as they clench you into the salty expanse of light brown skin.

The heel slipped back into the flat, giving you a newfound sense of pressure and dread as the toes gripped you securely. All for the name of science! Although, Hannah wouldn't deny she was having fun with her new toy. And she was going to find another pebble just like it for her other flat, to take her all the way through middle school, she decided right then and there, Even if she had to rule out every pebble in the world, ask for all sorts of rocks for her birthday to slip into the shoe until she found one that pleased her petite feet just like you did, sucked up her hyper-active footsweat so nobody would notice.

And there were a lot of pebbles in the world.

"Let the experiments begin!" Hannah thinks aloud, clenching her toes roughly around you.

Death.
111322221211111121211.content:
Ringringringringring!

Even from under the expanse of foot, Skye could hear the bells. Lunch was over, and he'd wasted his time under this magnificent foot. But, was that time really a waste? This felt so, so right to him.



Miss Curtis's foot lifted off of your body. While you should be rejoicing, you can't help but miss it. You haven't felt that warm and safe since Kaitlyn got her bitchy hands on you. You decide not to lose that feeling.

Her left foot is already grabbing for its shoe, so there's no time to lose. You lunge over her right foot and roll into the discarded green flat that lay there. Your face hits the insole and sweat splashes up. Doubts are beginning to form...

There's no time for that, as the twenty-something's toes grab for the shoe. Your world shakes, then goes dark as the foot enters. You'd positioned yourself under the arch in order to keep as safe as possible, but the shaking slid you around the insole like a fat man on an ice rink. You watch in awe as the foot crashes into the bottom of the flat. The titanic foot slides forward, but you realize something is wrong... The foot is ahead of you. Why is it not over you?



The sky goes dark, and Skye has enough time to look up and realize his mistake before the teacher sets her foot all the way down, trapping the poor boy under her heel. Now, Skye didn't go unnoticed. Even with her feet worn down from all her standing, she could still feel the inch sized boy under her. Reason told her to take the shoe off and remove the foreign object, but she couldn't. It just felt too good.

As the kids all find their seats, Miss C passes out their assignment for the day. She walks down each row of desks, handing out the paper to each student. Every step she takes damns Skye to further torment. Unlike the warm, welcoming flesh he felt when her arches lightly rested on him, the skin of her heel was rough, without much give, and each step forced the entire weight of her body on him. When her foot lifted, Skye was given just enough room for the sweat rich atmosphere to flood his mouth and make him gag. When her foot went down, the sole shoved him into the insole, forcing torrents of sweat out of it to add to Skye's personal hell.

As Miss C reached the last student, she stopped. He wouldn't take the paper from her. "Sarah, what's wrong?" she asked her. "I don't wanna do math." Miss C sighed, and keeled down to talk to her. The heel of her right foot popped out slightly, but she didn't notice while she tried to persuade a first grader to do its homework.

Skye felt his cycle of hell under the heel break for a second. Miss Curtis's foot was at a 45 degree angle from the ground, and the shoe was at a 35 degree angle, slightly off of her foot. This gave Skye room to breathe, and even let some light in. He had realized his mistake, and was done with this woman. There was no comfort in here. He pried his bruised body from the insole, careful not to hit the sole that was only inches (in his scale) above him. He began his climb to the source of light, but before he was even half way there, the shoe shifted slightly. It was too much for Skye, and he started the slide down the shoe's slope. He crashed into the ball of her foot, which still touched the insole.

Miss C felt something hit her foot. She figured it was the insole just acting up, as old ones tend to do. She could easily stomp her foot and be rid of the problem, but a breakthrough was so, so close with Sarah, and she wasn't going to jeopardize it.

Skye quickly g ot his bearings, and he scampered to the opening. He knew if he didn't make it, he wouldn't be alive for long. Does he?
111322221211111121211.title: Mistakes.

choices: Stay in the car for safety.
Leave the car for safety.
11132222121111112122.content:
Silhouetted in the bright lights of the hallway, the dark shapes of dozens of kids flooded the room. You turned to run, but the pounding feet were already upon you. The first couple of kids missed you, their massive steps soaring over your head, but that luck would never last.

Laying right side up near you was a plastic toy car, window eternally ajar. It's frame would be stronger than shrunken flesh and bones. You run for it, dodging the kids as best as you could. Doing a very impressive flip, you dive into the window and land on the seat. No seat belts, but it'd have to do.

It had only taken around three seconds for the door to open and you to enter the car, but it had felt like an eternity. You slump in the seat that was a bit too big for you, thankful to whatever gods were watching out for inch tall stowaways. As you sent up the silent prayer, the sky went dark. Did the gods not like it?

"Who left this toy out? We know that toys belong in the toy corner until playtime. I'll put it away this time, but next time, you'll be in trouble."

The booming voice of what you could only assume to be the teacher rocked the car. From behind the car swung her foot, stopping next to the driver side door. Encased it a ratty green flat, her foot was three times the length of your ride. Her hand grabbed the front of the car, pressing against the windshield and blocking the view from the front. She lifted, dragging the front end up and leaving the back end to dangle in the air.

She stood up, lightly swinging her arms as she walked to the corner of the room. For her, it was gentle and almost unnoticeable. For you, it felt like you were in a tornado. You smashed into the roof of the car, then into the sides, then back to the roof, then down to the back seat. You feel a bump as she sets the car down. Panting, you listen to her walk back to the front of the class. The sound of her voice as she taught the alphabet was soft and muted back here.

Laying in the back seat of a tiny toy car and nursing a bruised head, you can't help but wonder what happened to your life.

You slide down on your stomach, and stop five feet away, disoriented.

         "Damn it, I missed. Oh well, I could do this." Hearing her voice, you flip around to see the tip of her foot hit you. She was sliding her shoe along the ground, you might as well been hit by a train, the impact had the same effects. Your ribs shatter like twigs and you leg snaps. You start getting sucked downwards, which would make you nothing more then a stain. Unfortunately, your too busy dieing to stop it.

Well, at least you really pissed off a janitor, so your death has some value...though honestly, it was kind of a stupid move.
113.title: Just because your small doesn't mean your suicidal

choices: Go to Amelias First Hour and try and Grab her attention there.
Go to Amelias First Hour and wait outside for a ride.
Go to Amelias Second Hour
Play 'hitchhiker' and use people around you to get to Amelias Second Hour
Reads Choice
12.content:
As much as you hated it, Amelia was a Tomboy, who wouldn't freak out at the sight of a bug, with you have the misfortune of looking like. Not to mention that in second period, shes in Home Ec, and you were getting hungry. Plus, who knows, you might be stuck like this forever, and if it came down to it, you would have to live you life off what you can scavenge. And getting a steady food source, or even a 'home base' of sorts. Housing, at least what you could call housing at your size, in the Home Ec room would be great. Two main means of survival would be certain - Food and Shelter, would be certain. Water might also be available, but not most of the time.
Your trek to Amelia's First Period Class would be hard, its a considerable distance away(about a hallways length). Her Second Period, Home EC, was on the opposite side of the school, and god knows how fast you can travel in this god forsaken place. Of course, you could go to Amelia first period, and on the off chance you make it, you could use the always dangerous, always free Amelia Taxi Shoe Service. The danger being riding the fucking thing with your homicidal sister at the 'wheel'. You could also be caught in the hall during 'rush hour', the time in which kids may skip classes. So....what do you do?
12.title: Amelia Burns-hearts

choices: Amelia herself, heading to class. Well, at least you met that goal.
Ranae, one of your few admirers.
Amy, your archnemisis. This couldn't be good.
121.content:
Keeping it simple seemed like the way to go. Her first hour class was closeby, so as long as you beat the traffic, so to speak, you should have no trouble. You didn't even know what class she had first period, but on her first day as a freshman you had been forced to help her get around to all of her classes, and remembered in what room the first stop on her list had been. It was just across the hallway, to your excitement, which meant you'd get there in no time. With ten minutes to spare before the final class bell rang, you would have time to get in and even get comfortable before Amelia and her classmates arrived.

You begin the cross the hallway carefully, as if crossing a busy street. The corridor was hardly Frogger yet, but it would be in a couple of minutes. There were only small clusters of students that went by, reasonably often, but none that made you fearful in their proximity to you. Even so, the echoing sounds their footfalls made were maddening, and practically overloaded your sense of hearing. That was just one of many cons to being tiny. You figured you'd pick up some advantages along the way that wouldn't make things seem so bleak, though.

You begin to hustle as you realize someone has come out of the bathroom just a few yards from you. You hadn't accounted for someone to emerge to close, and only left yourself time to get away from people who were coming from around the corner into your hallway. You hadn't planned for anyone to be upon you so quickly, and you feel pangs of paralyzing terror come over you. Rushing forward, you desperately tried to envision how much time it would take for you to reach the other side safely, and to slip into the classroom... gravely, you realized that at this rate you might not make it.

The footsteps were getting louder as they resounded off of the floor. You hurry, measuring out the distance as best as you could, as well as planning how you'd avoid the feet that were already headed in a beeline for your body. Sweat began to develop on your face, but you were in too much of a rush to dab it away. Then it occured to you: if you were going to die, you might as well see the face of who was going to become your unwitting killer. Turning your head while running, you manage to see who it is in your shaking vision. Just your luck. It was none other than...
121.title: First Hour

choices: ...manage to find something to cling to and crawl up.
...are kicked up into the air, falling wounded into Amelia's path.
...fall off to the side, basically unharmed, and follow Amelia.
1211.content:
Without even looking up you knew who it was. You recognized the gothic boots that now treaded toward you, threatening to stomp you out of existence... they belonged to your sister, Amelia. Ironically enough, she had found you before you could find her. This was both good and bad. Since emerging from the bathroom she was extremely close, and would be upon you in seconds, but isn't this what you had travelled for anyway? As long as you found a way to evade her feet, you'd be all set.

But that was the dilemma. It isn't long before your body is swallowed up in Amelia's titanic shadow, and you see her boot's descent toward you. You felt like you were being faced with a bear, and standing your ground would make it back off. For lack of a better idea, that was just what you did. You also realized that her boot was going to miss you, which helped your resolve. Still, you hadn't accounted for the tremor it would make, instantly bowling you over, or the fact that you would land on her boot instead of falling on your ass. You had actually been kicked up onto it, just like dust.

That might have been better, albeit more shameful, but now you were in far more danger. Unless you could regain your balance, you would fall off of the toe of Amelia's boot to the ground below. If the drop itself didn't kill you, her other foot would finish you off in its stride. With your heart in your throat, you desperately tried to find anything to anchor you to the shoe, knowing that with the next step your chance would be lost, as well as your life. Fumbling blindly for a hold, you...
1211.title: Kicked Up

choices: You drop into the boot, only to find you're stuck in her black toe socks.
You try to contact her now by pounding on her sock-clad ankle.
12111.content:
You actually do manage to find something to cling to, unsure of what it was even as you hung onto it for dear life. The hasty motion of Amelia's walking stirred up a whipping wind that made it painful for you to keep your eyes open, but as you climbed using your new hold you were able to get to a position on the shoe which was a little less aerodynamic. You now realize that it was one of the metallic studs on Amelia's boot that had saved you. You had always thought that they were over-the-top, even for your fledgling goth of a sister, but now you vowed that you would never complain about them again.

Without any close calls, you arrive with Amelia at her first hour class. The class was Physical Science, by the look of the room. As she settles into her seat, willfully ostracized from the majority of the class, you begin to plot your next move. Crawling the height and breadth of your sister seemed pretty risky, but your options were incredibly limited. After all, there was no way you could get her attention from down here, because Amelia could never feel anything through the thick material of the boot, and her attire had very little skin to show for as it was. You would have to rely on other means.

For now, you would need shelter. When your sister got up again, you'd go through the same painstaking and potentially fatal process of trying to stay attached to the boot as she walked. Instead of fighting for your life, you could always stay snug in the boot, at least temporarily. After an uneventful but very informative trip upward (regarding the best way to climb the gothic boot) you reach the collar, and peer down inside. Amelia's black socks were all that stood in your way, but you were small enough to slip down inside without touching them. They were your best bet at getting her attention, because she might actually be able to feel you through them, if you dared to attempt contact.
12111.title: Shelter

12112.content:
Despite your best efforts to find anything to anchor you, there was simply nothing within reach. At first, you find yourself sliding down the breadth of the boot... that is until Amelia took another step. The momentum of your slide coupled with the step sent you catapulting into the air, destined to meet your end on the floor below. A violent rush of wind cuts off your air temporarily, and you are sent soaring to about knee height before plummeting back down as quickly as you had been tossed upward. There's no time to brace in any way for the impact, and in your disorientation you are suddenly sent forcefully to the unforgiving floor tile.

You felt a warm trickle by your ear, dizzily looking around. Your head and brain addled, you were seeing double... but as if by some curse your vision cleared up just in time for you to see the bringer of your unfortunate fate. On the same stride, Amelia's other boot was already coming up in step, its owner completely unaware that it was about to descend upon her brother and finish what the first boot in the pair had started. You can see the grime that had collected on the sole of Amelia's boot... each narrow groove and detail as it hovered over you in what felt like slow motion. It came as a swift end to your agony, crumpled in an incapacitated heap at the feet of the gigantic goth.

Had she been aware of it, Amelia probably would have felt at least some remorse. Even someone as cruel and angsty as her wasn't without a conscience. However, the debased truth was that she would never even be aware of the heinous execution she had committed to one of her own blood. Sure, she'd hear the news of her brother's disappearance and speculate for some time... but the reality was too farfetched to ever occur to the girl. Your mouth hangs open in an inaudible scream as the boot connects with your maimed body, crushing it effortlessly into a scarlet paste beneath the comparitively tremendous weight. Amelia walked on, undisturbed, to her first hour class (English) and learned about dramatic irony.
12112.title: Fratricide

choices: Go for Renea, she is safer.
Go to Amelia, Shes more trustworthy
The bell rings
1212.content:
Renae. Renae and you had been friends for a few years. But when you were both sixteen, you found out she wanted to be more then friends, and to the extreme(at the time you were not dating Anna of course). You declined but she kept dropping hints that she liked you. It became creepy the moment you realized she wanted you...in her pants. Now let this sink in while you reflect on your size, and her lust for you. Yep, thats Renae, and yes she would.

Shes not far away, and in this situation, you could use her as a taxi. Shes not really afriad of insects, just ignores them unless they are around her face. If a insect crawls on her arm or face, or any bare skin, she will kill it. If one flys around her face, she'll kill it. But if she sees one on the ground, she won't. Its a lucky break, you won't have to worry about being crushed.

If she sees you.

You could also just continue on to you loving sister, Amelia. Of course, no improvements, more risk of death there. But god knows what Renae will do to you. She might even....*shudder*
1212.title: Renae - Picture of a Stalker

choices: Bail and avoid being crushed underfoot. Follow Renae.
Wait it out. Renae does look down. (Renae POV)
12121.content:
As apprehensive as you are, she is the only one you're guaranteed of in this school who wants you unharmed. Amelia, even as your sibling, is cruel by nature and might hurt you. Renea has an undying adoration for you that, although inexplicable, would never let her maim you purposely. Seeing as she is already heading toward you, to, it seemed to be a form of providence. With her conveniently walking straight toward you, you wracked your brain for possible outcomes of being found. You only had a few seconds to do this, of course, because the girl was fast approaching, and you would only have a narrow time window to try to make yourself noticed before she passed by. There was also the overhanging danger of being stepped on by the oblivious teen.

The tremendous noise of Renae's flip flops slapping on the hallway tile as she advanced made it hard to think. Her arrival at your "doorstep" was imminent, but you had made your decision. Waving and jumping as an SOS, you felt like someone who had washed up on a deserted island and had just spotted a plane in the sky that could potentially rescue him. Renae might as well have been your rescue plan, if you could garner her attention, that is. the gap was closing fast, and you found yourself in frantic desperation for her to simply look down. Her flip-flops were gaining, and at this rate you either had to bail before you were crushed underfoot or ride it out, hoping she'd look down within the next few seconds before pssing Amelia's first hour classroom. Adrenaline rushed through your bloodstream as the agonizing seconds passed by like grains of sand in an hourglass.
12121.title: Cutting It Close

choices: Get higher
Get closer
Get the fuck out of here
123.content:
There is probably little time to make it to Amelia's first hour, as shown by the moon clock up above you. If you're going to get to Amelia, you shouldn't waste time trying to make it somewhere impossibly fast, even if it is closer. Home Ec, Amelia's second class, was indeed farther away from you then her first. However, you'd be cutting it too close trying to make her first class, and you aren't exactly in the best state to fuck around with. You have to get after it and get to her as soon as possible, and thus you do.

         The journey starts off pretty easy, the bell doesn't ring until you make it to the center of your school, the lunch room. It is a big circular room that has hallways branching off and an auditorium up between the gym and itself, leading to a stage poking out into the gym. You sprint to the other side of the cafeteria though, making it to the oposite wall the houses doors leading to the auditorium. You don't especially feel like going to there, or cutting through it to go to the gym, so you instead walk along the wall.

         Eventually the bell does sound, and giants and giantesses alike rush around you on the way to their classes, but none come near you. Unless the were dragging themselves along the wall, they'd have no need too. You make a note of this handy way of travel for later, before finally making it to the far side of the room. Here was a huge hole leading to another hallway, and you turn and start to go down it. The first door on the left is Amelia's Home Ec classroom, and you are probably only ten minutes late to it. Can they blame you though? You didn't even have time to go to your locker! You chuckle at your own joke as you continue on.

         At last, you are here. Outside the Home Ec room, your target awaiting you inside. You let loose a sigh of relief, you made it here alive. Now comes the hard part - getting to Amelia and having her not kill you. Also making sure none of her classmates maim you either. That'd be pretty bad. You slip through a crack in the door and go inside.

         The first thing that greets you is the sound of beaters beating. The smell of cooking is filling the room with it's aroama, and you observe that today the class is baking cookies for the end of the year assembly. It's basically an excuse for the teacher's to not draw up lesson plans for the students on one of the last days of school by hosting an event for the whole day in which everyone relaxes and enjoys life. Some can clean out their lockers, others just visit their friends before they're gone for the summer, it's all a very fun event. The whole school attends it, so you'd hate to still be lost and small then. On that note, you make your way towards them all.

         Gah! This is hard. Everyone is wearing hairnets and aprons, from the back, they all look pretty much identical. They're too far above for you to easily identify their faces from this far away. You're either going to have to get higher, or get closer. Both of those sound pretty bad, but one has to happen. What do you do?
123.title: Home spECk

choices: Attempt to run through it and avoid rolling pin.
Tarzan your way behind her using the straps.
Wait(-10 minutes)
1231.content:
Obviously getting close to a bunch of people running around cooking is a terrible idea. Honestly you wonder why you'd even consider it when you have a much better option: getting high. No, not off narcotics you silly punk! High as in altitude. You need to scale one of the counters where they are cooking! That way you'd be out of the way of their feet, and in the way of their eyesight. You'd best hope they don't mistake you for an insect though, because that'd probably not go over well on a health inspection.

         You rush to the side as your follow along the counter. Being just underneath none of the girls can see or touch you. You go to the other end where you find it - a plug in! Just as you were hoping, and cord goes straight up from the plug in onto the countertop, oh you're lucky today! Well, besides being shrunk. Whatever lifes a rollercoaster. You start to shimmy up it until you can bring yourself up on the counter. Now you see them, all the girls working in here. There is a guy, but he's off on an entirely different counter doing his own thing.

         The stereotype of Home Ec being only girls is entirely accurate. You recognize all of them instantly, from when they were with Amelia at times: Abigail, Abby, Jaide, Amelia(duh), Nicole, Lauren, Lily, Ashlyn, Tristen, and Frida. The guy appears to be Timmy, but fuck Timmy he's not important. All these girls are though, their various kitchen activities are in the way of you reaching Amelia. I hope you're ready for an obstacle course of life or death!


         First off is Abigail, whose rolling batter of some sort with a rolling pin. It's taking up the majority of the counter space so if you want to keep going you'll have to run it. However, some loose ties are hanging out from her apron, you could try and potentially tarzan you way through this. You could also wait her out and try and buy time, but class periods only last about an hour apiece so you aren't exactly bleeding time here.(50 minutes remain, running out of time from waiting too much will result in Amelia leaving and you being stuck here without her)
1231.title: Getting high during Home Ec

choices: Between midnight and noon (12am-12pm) [Morning]
Between noon and midnight(12pm-12am)[Afternoon - Evening]
12311.content: This rolling pin will quite frankly, mold you into dough and trample any chances of you making it out of this alive. If you're going to do this, you're going to have to time it perfectly. What time is it for you? Your luck on timing this right will depend on it being the right time.
12311.title: Time it just right!

123111.content:
You watch the rolling pin, and wait for her to roll it back to herself. Then roll it back to the end. Repeat, repeat, repeat. You study it, trying to judge when to run, and as she starts bringing it back, you strike! You try sprinting across the dough as fast as your little legs can take you. You sneak a peak over towards her, and to your horror see a large piece of wood roll towards you at about the speed of a semi. Also probably with as much force, and you try running faster. Almost there, you about make it to the edge-

         Then you don't. The rolling pin catches you off guard and slams into you, hard. Your body is thrown into the dough and firmly planted in it as it rolls over you more and more. You thrash, you scream, you try with all your might to escape your dough-ey prison, but no matter how much you struggle you can not escape. Eventually you are cut apart from the rest of the dough while still ensnared and put on a tray, and even more later you are put inside a dark, hot place. Your final thoughts are about how it's true, a lot of deaths really are just wrong place, wrong time.

------------------------------------------
         You are now Amelia. Your class has been cooking for the better part of an hour now, and you hate it. Why should your grades be determined by how well you can cook for a bunch of ungrateful nimrods? Why shouldn't you be entitled to all this grub instead of their ungrateful asses. You snort with disgust as you pick up a cookie. You helped cook, you've earned this. You plop it into your mouth and chew. Mhmmm....this is actually pretty good. It has a...unique flavor to it. You're going to have to swipe more later, and maybe even the recipe. If you have anything to do with it, more of these cookies will be made, and go straight into your belly!
123111.title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time

choices: Cookie Cutters
Tray
123112.content:
You concentrate very hard, trying to summon your imaginary ancestors power to give you all the luck in the universe. You need to time this right, you need to make it to the other side and get to Amelia as fast as possible. You will not be able to do this if you die here, now. You need this to be right. You wait....wait....waait....and then let loose a burst of speed! You practically fly over the surface, as your feet almost stick to it but don't. You make it to the other side and turn around, the rolling pin flattening out the footprints you just made. Woah, if you had gone a second later, you would have been.... Never Mind that, you made it! On to the next trial.

         Over here you have Abby, who is currently taking some of Abigail's rolled out dough and using nifty little cutters to make cute little cookie shapes. The whole thing looks pretty cheesey, or cookie-y, but you can't seem to roll your eyes at it. However, her phobia of insects make it so she can't either, you'll have to sneak by her somehow. You look up ahead of you. On the side farthest from her is a tray full of cut out cookie shapes. You could probably sneak through by hiding behind them, but it'd be dangerous. On the side closest to her, you have her collection of cookie cutters. You could weave around them and avoid detection that way. Each side is dangerous, but one may be fatal. Which do you choose?
123112.title: Right place, right time

1231121.content:
Running on a tray is pretty much a one way ticket into an oven. You don't even want to mess with that idea, much less put your life on the line for it. So you pick the route closer to her, the cookie cutters. Sneaking up to one, you slowly edge your way along them until you make it about halfway past her. She then looks down and sets her current cutter down, and then picks the one you were using as cover up! Unmasked, it isn't hard to see you and she sees you immediately. You see fire in this girl's eyes as she grips the cutter in her hand. You literally gulp with terror, staring right up at her. You can't breathe, you can't move, fear is kind of a bitch.

         "I..." she starts to say, trembling. You snap out of it then, starting to sprint the other way. "...hate..." she continues. Her eyes squint as she brings the cookie cutter up. "BUGS!!!" whispers very loud, no one else hearing it except for you. Immediately you are assaulted by a giant cookie cutter battering the area around you. In front, to the left, right, behind, left, right,in front, left, ri-SPLAT. You are taken out immediately by the cutter and don't even have time to think about it. Not even enough for a witty joke, you're just dead. Abby holds the cookie cutter up to her eye and sighs. She takes it over to Timmy to be washed and then walks back to her station. That's that.
1231121.title: You've been cookie cut.

choices: Go for swim
Go in dry
1231122.content:
You decide the cookie cutters are too close for comfort, and run up ahead on to it. You see now that it isn't anywhere near being full, so you wouldn't have to worry about any accidental trips to the oven. You hide behind a cookie every time Abby sets down another, thus giving you more cover to continue on with your pursuit. Eventually making it to the end, you wait for Abby to turn away before jumping off and running away, turning a corner and going to the next segment of counter.

         Here you see no one, just a sink taking up the whole portion. You look at it, you're actually kind of sticky gross and sweaty. Thirst is also starting to occur, and the last thing you need is dehydrated. Perhaps you should go for a swim? Just from this side to the other, you swim OK and you could just go along the edge of it incase you started to flounder. Then you could pull yourself out. Or you could deal with it and just move on, using the back where the spout and handles are to safely pass dry.
1231122.title: The obvious death route is actually legit.

12311221.content:
You're hot, you're sweaty, you're thirsty. Yes, you are many adjectives right now and would like to rectify that situation. You take off your shoes and shirt, and dive into the cool water. The relief you feel is almost too much to describe, but you can say it's heavenly. You grab your shoes and wrap them in your shirt, dragging them along on the dry counter while you swam along the side. Then out of nowhere, a girl appears! You can't hear her over your own splashing, but she suddenly pushes down on something next to the spout.

         Almost immediately, the water starts pulling you in rather strongly. You fumble and drop your shoes and shirt in the water and they get sucked down the whirlpool that now rests immediately in the center of the sink. You hold on as hard as you can, but your strength fails you and you are enveloped into the water as you black out. Sadly, you don't ever wake up. Your body is washed down with the rest of the water and ends up with the rest in the sewer, surrounded by feces, piss, and water, your grave is surely that of a sad individual. Deserving of you, for being an idiot.
12311221.title: [Jaws theme plays]

choices: Get some dough.
Don't be an idiot.
12311222.content:
Yeah no, let's not go for a swim. You choose to continue on as normal, walking by and seeing a girl, Jaide, come over. You stop to listen to her conversation. "Hey Mrs. Martin, should I drain this sink?"

         "Why was it full of water in the first place?" a far off voice remarks.

         "I don't know, I think we were using it to wash our hands and just left it plugged." Jaide replies

         "Oh. Then yes Jaide, please drain it. Thanks for keeping an eye on things, but get back to work! We need enough cookies to feed hundreds of kids, we can't mess around too much! It'll take all my classes the next few days to meet the quota." the voice replies.

         With that, Jaide drains the sink and some alternate reality you that was stupid enough to go swimming. You're really embarrassed you almost died like that. You move on to the next obstacle. Here is a giant gleaming white bowl. A sweet smell wafts over to you, cookie dough. Your favorite treat. No girl is currently near it and you could probably sneak up and grab a lick or two. What's the harm, right?
12311222.title: [sexual joke]

choices: Hide behind cookies and sneak by slowly
RUN MOTHERFUCKER RUN
123112222.content:
You could sit here and write an entire novel about why choosing to go take some food out of the currently in use bowl is a terrible idea. You could go on to bitch and moan about how you think up some of the dumbest shit in existence. However, that has been done to death, so let's just skip that shall we. You watch Nicole come over and grab the bowl, taking it an the dough away. Well then.

         Continuing on you see one more girl between you and another turn, she's decorating some of the cookies. Using a variety of edible glitter, sprinkles, and icing - she's pretty much a masterchef. You figure you'll have to sneak past her again, which shouldn't be too hard. However, you don't have as much of a convenient cover like you did with Abby. You're going to have to get creative here.
123112222.title: Knowledge is power

choices: You keep an eye on the opening and wait for it to reapear
Abigail doesn't give you the option, as she...
12312.content:
You've never used an apron, but the one you see before you is pretty generic you think. White front, no back besides two strings tied together to hold it there. Pure white, like eggshells. Yep, this is probably the most generic apron in existence, and it's going to come in real handy shortly. You back up as you target one of the strings, flopping around as Abigail moves. You ready yourself, then charge! You thrust off th countertop and flail for the stirng, and...yes! You manage to successfully grab it and swing around back behind her, and in fact right into her back! The impact hits you rather hard, and your grip slips up...you start to tumble down...down...down....

         ...into Abigails pants. Yes, there is a little gap where you fall straight down between jean shorts and panties, and your impact is actually rather soft. You imagine yourself having a nosebleed from how perverted this, but no time for that. You need to get out of her! You start to climb the giantesses bottom and eventually make it up top to the entrance you fell into. You attempt to balance yourself on top of the strap, but instead Abigail shifts and you fall again, this time down between bare skin and panty.

         Now everything is dark, smells weird, and is also really hot. Your eyes adjust and in front of you you see it...Abigails "back door" so to speak. You look up above and see the hole you fell down is evidently sealed. You let loose a grunt of frustration before you think...what do you do?
12312.title: Tarzan your way behind her using the straps.

123122.content:
Abigail walks towards the oven and puts the cookies in it. You get rubbed by her cheeks as she walks and pushed into her anus as she bends over. After she sets the temperature to the right amount she goes and takes a seat as she waits for the cookies to be done. You feel her walking again and all of a sudden you feel her drop, you feel your legs get completely crushed under her wait "ahhh!" You scream from the pain. Abigail is feeling uncomfortable while sitting on the chair, its like there is a lump under her, she decides to shift around here and there to get comfortable. You scream in pain as she shifts around and crushes the bones in your limbs making you completely immobile with no escape from this girl's smelly anus.

Abigail finally found a comfortable position while she waits but now she feels a rumbling coming from her rear. You hear a loud rumble coming from her and yell "no not like this" then suddenly a thunderous fart that knocks you out and leaves you with no air In her panties. Abigail did her best to keep from darting loud and succeeded in not letting anyone here it. Later she finished home ec and went home unaware of your corpse in her panties that was lost in her ass later as she slept.
123122.title: Abigail doesn't give you the option, as she...

choices: Try and outrun Kaitlyn
Go take shelter in a locker
Play dead
Run towards Kaitlyn to take shelter behind her, because WHY NOT?!

If you really had wanted to arrive there, you could've made it in ten minutes, but there was really no rush since your sister wasn't even in the classroom yet. As if on cue, the shrill bell sounds, and there is a thunderous din of noise as virtually every student converges into the hallways. You stand rigidly with your back to the wall beside the entrance to the chem leb, being meticulously careful not to be crushed by any stray foot as it passes by. After what feels like an eon, you finally notice Britney heading for the door, gabbing mindlessly with some of her other ditzy friends that are clearly not in any rush to get into the class despite the bell's imminent ringing. Britney and another friend are the last to slip in, but they still have a minute to spare to talk by the door.

The gigantic sandal of Britney comes to a clamorous drop just a few inches from you, and you wonder what course of action to take. You had a window of opportunity to your sister's attention now, of course, or in the very least hitch a ride at her feet. But then again you might also want to wait ntil she sat down as was already idlely looking around the room in boredom to catch her attention. That option also came with the risk of someone else finding you too, however. Decisions, decisions. You had less than a minute to sweat it out, and it would take at least thirty seconds to secure yourself on Brit's sandal, so think fast. Then again, you didn't even have to choose her. Another blond girl with blue eyes. Is a dumb ass like your sister, Britney, and happens to be one of Britney's many 'girlfriends'. Not in the dating sense though. Only has a few classes with Britney, and didn't really acknowledge your existence much when you saw her. She is also afraid of bugs, but don't let that stop you from being stupid trying!

Renae
A girl in the same class as you, she has had a crush on you for awhile, and wouldn't hesitate to 'take advantage' of your size(if you know what I mean). She has alot of freckles, black hair, and wears black. But imagine what she'd be like drunk. Thats the stuff nightmares piss themselves about.

Courtney:
Blond with lots of freckles, Courtney is just one of those random background types. You only started noticing her when she was the size of a building, going out with a guy...but kind of slutty. She'd ride any guys roller coaster, if you catch my drift. She wears loose fitting shirts and shorts so short it's almost illegal. Almost.

Heather:
Black hair, asian, and all the intellegence. Heather is one cold calculating bitch. Despite being rather cute, she remains single because "no guys are up to my standards". She may be a feminist, so watch out for her. She has a small B cup, and wears glasses. She may be able to reverse your shrunken state, but that's if she wants to. Rather not squander her genius and all.

Emily:
Emily is a freshman, with everything going for her physically. You're saying she has a nice ass, if you're one to judge. And you are, you'd even say you're the ass concierge. Besides that, she has a deep tan and a nice rack, and wears clothing tight enough to show it. Yowza! Plays Volleyball.

Mikayla:
She is 16 and 5' 5" with brown hair and green eyes. She is quite fond of you and is popular with many people at school, though mainly because she's "gotten around" so to say. You dated for a time but eventually agreed to a mutual break up, which she understood. May be trustworthy. She also plays Volleyball.

Shea:
She is 16 and is 5' 6" with brown hair and amber colored eyes. She is an african american. She is on the volleyball team and is popular with a lot of people at school due to her outstanding sports record and community work. You flirt with her occasionally, so you suppose you're on good terms?

Abigail:
She is 14 and 5'1" with short blonde hair and green eyes. She is caucasian, and one of your sister, Amelia's friends. She is much cheerier though, and is about average in the intelligence department. You know of her, don't know her, so she doesn't like or dislike you.

Abby:
She is 13, 4'9, and afraid of bugs like no other. Afraid of bugs as in "Oh fuck a bug, let me squash it!" too. She won't shriek, she won't eek. She'll stomp, inialliate, and destroy any bug that attempts to touch her. She is fond of you though, and might even have a girlhood crush on you. That's a thing you bet.

Jaide:
Asian, 12, and 4'11, Jaide is a grade below Amelia and a very shy girl. She's sweet to her friends, and quiet to everyone else. You never managed to get that close to her due to that, but you assume you'd of gotten along. Has black hair.





Final Note: Please follow all the rules at the top.

Edit:
I would also like to say that this story can be unaware/aware. As I know people prefer them both, its up to the writer if Skye is found. But keep in mind he is small, and would need to get up close to their face just to be noticed,and even then, might not.
Skye can leave School, he can go anywhere. Why? Because hes Skye. >:P
